content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1564515838239{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1573232365997{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Read up on the latest MarTech topics and trends, and learn what’s working (and what’s not) for agencies like yours.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1587495626892{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Our brand new “Top Trends at a Glance” infographic provides a fast and easy snapshot of what’s going on in MarTech.

Learn the hot trends agencies are jumping all over vs. the ones that are leaving them cold. Even better, find out how industry experts are utilizing MarTech to help them tackle the many challenges in today’s tough economic landscape.

Plus, gain access to brand new stats on:

  • What agency services are most in-demand
  • Where clients are sourcing their agencies
  • What clients today are really looking for in an agency
  • And much more!

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent hide-cta” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
